name: Maile Penguin's Christmas Card Adventure [DEMO]
description:
(Work-in-progress Demo)

A holiday greeting... but so much more. Santa can't find his way to Maile Penguin's house, and the only way to help him is by harnessing the power of 8 Heart Blinks found throughout her neighborhood!! Search everywhere, find those Heart Blinks, and save Christmas!! Inspired by actual locations in my daughter's life, this is by far the dorkiest and most ambitious holiday card I have ever created.

Currently this demo only contains two Heart Blinks, but all eight are planned to be accessible (plus additional features and effects) by Christmas 2021.

Currently you can download the NES ROM file here or play in browser at https://theretroverse.com/welcome/icon_view?g=TVRneg==

Featuring original Chiptune Christmas music by Three Ninjas.
